title: Calories in Evaporated Milk
meta_description: Learn calories in evaporated milk per 100 ml, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and full nutrition facts for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Whole, unsweetened evaporated milk from a can; no additives or dilutions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100 ml of evaporated milk provides ~133 kcal with 6.8 g protein and 7.6 g fat.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup of evaporated milk?
faqs.a: About 340 kcal for 240 ml (one standard cup).

faqs.q: Is evaporated milk high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~6.8 g protein per 100 ml, more concentrated than regular milk.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in evaporated milk?
faqs.a: 7.6 g total fat per 100 ml, with 4.9 g saturated.

faqs.q: Does evaporated milk have added sugar?
faqs.a: Unsweetened versions have natural lactose sugars (~9.9 g per 100 ml); sweetened condensed has much more.

faqs.q: How does evaporated milk compare to regular milk calories?
faqs.a: Higher at 133 kcal per 100 ml vs. ~42 kcal for whole milk, due to water removal.
